channel.title: Critical Thinking
channel.description: Fallacy Island is a place to think about thinking. Grab a chair, have a drink, and open your mind.
channel.itunes:author: Frank Bergdoll
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fallacy Island is a place to think about thinking. Grab a chair, have a drink, and open your mind.
channel.itunes:summary: Fallacy Island is a place to think about thinking. Grab a chair, have a drink, and open your mind.

item.title: Fallacy Island Episode 0
item.description:
In this podcast, I welcome everyone to Fallacy Island and outline where I hope this podcast will go.
Hope you enjoy it! Please provide feedback and ideas.

e-mail: fallacyisland@me.com
